text:
Hi guys, maybe this is a question that has been asked before but I didn’t find anything specific about it, my question is the following, Can a module be in a template by default and not required?

So that the editor when loading the template sees that module but can remove or change it. I have tried the following but it didn’t work:

`{% dnd_area "test_dnd_area", label="Test DND Area" %}`
      `{% dnd_section %}`
        `{% dnd_column %}`
          `{% dnd_module`
            `path="@projects/modules/CTABanner",`
            `label="Test CTA Banner",`
            `content="Default content for testing",`
            `button_text="Click Me",`
            `link_field={`
              `"url": {`
                `"content_id": null,`
                `"type": "EXTERNAL",`
                `"href": "/contact"`
              `},`
              `"open_in_new_tab": true,`
              `"no_follow": false`
            `}`
          `%}`
        `{% end_dnd_module %}`
      `{% end_dnd_column %}`
    `{% end_dnd_section %}`
    `{% end_dnd_area %}`
